entry.title: Beach Hazards Statement issued May 04 at 10:34PM PDT until May 05 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNEAKER WAVES AND ENHANCED RIP CURRENTS THURSDAY... .A longer period northwest swell will arrive early Thursday. The long period swell will result in increased risk of sneaker waves and strong rip currents.
